name: Rewind (itch) (jlpinkcarat)
description:
After a car crash, Skunk is stuck between life and death as a ghost. With such a sudden young death, they are still bound to earth emotionally and that attachment prevents them from ascending fully to the afterlife.  

 Skunk has to come to terms with their death and slowly let go of the things and places that still bind them to earth. With the help of their now sentient pet raccoon, Mosh, who helps them navigate this limbo state of being; they essentially rewind skunk’s life through a series of puzzles and clues, so they can finally die in peace.
